Module edu.citadel.cprl
Package edu.citadel.cprl.ast

Class SubprogramDecl

java.lang.Object
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.AST
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.Declaration
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.SubprogramDecl
Direct Known Subclasses:
FunctionDecl, ProcedureDecl
public abstract class SubprogramDecl
extends Declaration
Base class for CPRL procedures and functions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    SubprogramDecl​(Token subprogId)
    Construct a subprogram declaration with the specified subprogram identifier.

    Returns the label associated with the first statement of the subprogram.

    Returns the number of bytes required for all variables in the initial declarations.
